EmailTemplate.name: 07-08-21 BNK Connect e-Zine LATAM.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: CONNECT: Read our latest magazine and stay ahead of emerging trends
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Changing consumer behaviors—on top of payment and technology evolutions—continue to disrupt banking. So staying on top of the latest industry trends is a herculean task. But, as always, we’re here to help. Find out what the current and future trends are for FIs across the globe in our latest issue of CONNECT magazine. Learn more about: - What digital-first means - Cloud and API developments - Protecting your ATMs - Thoughts from our customers and analysts including RBR and Royal Bank of Canada ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
